activities: Primary consumer facing market research across a number of industries – automotive, beer and spirits, etc.  Personal information collected as part of the research process in order to contact respondents and conduct research.  Individual personal information is never divulged to the end client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client and consumer.  Consumer data includes phone numbers, email addresses and addresses. The data covered does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: 7th Sense L.P.'s privacy policy incorporates the Safe Harbor Principles into its rules and includes an effective enforcement mechanism via dispute resolution available from the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
